statements: SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, page_visited FROM website_traffic_data WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic';
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT traffic_source FROM website_traffic_data;
SELECT page_visited, conversion_rate FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversion_rate > 2.00;
SELECT id, date, page_visited, traffic_source, conversion_rate FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT page_visited, SUM(conversion_rate) AS total_conversions FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY page_visited HAVING total_conversions > 20 ORDER BY total_conversions DESC;

SELECT traffic_source, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY traffic_source ORDER BY avg_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT date, COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 GROUP BY date ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT page_visited, traffic_source, DATE_FORMAT(date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM website_traffic_data WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic' ORDER BY formatted_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_visited = 'HomePage';
SELECT visitor_id, visit_timestamp FROM website_traffic_data WHERE referral_source = 'Google';
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY visitor_id DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, referral_source FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visitor_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005);
SELECT content_id, content_type, creation_date FROM marketing_content ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, visitor_id, page_visited FROM website_traffic_data WHERE referral_source = 'Google' AND visit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT content_id, content_type, creation_date FROM marketing_content WHERE content_type = 'Blog Post' ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT page_visited, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY page_visited HAVING visit_count > 100 ORDER BY visit_count DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, MIN(visit_timestamp) AS first_visit, MAX(visit_timestamp) AS last_visit FROM website_traffic_data GROUP BY visitor_id ORDER BY last_visit DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT page_visited, timestamp FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversion_status = true;
SELECT brand_name, average_conversion_rate FROM brand_performance ORDER BY average_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT content_text, views_count FROM marketing_content WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT visitor_id, page_visited, timestamp FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_visited = 'Home' AND conversion_status = true;
SELECT visitor_id, timestamp, conversion_status FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_visited = 'Homepage' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT content_id, content_text, published_date, views_count FROM marketing_content WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY views_count DESC;
SELECT brand_name, average_conversion_rate FROM brand_performance WHERE average_conversion_rate > 0.2 ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT visitor_id, page_visited, timestamp, conversion_status FROM website_traffic_data WHERE conversion_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, average_conversion_rate, website_traffic_value FROM brand_performance WHERE website_traffic_value > 1000000 ORDER BY average_conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_ip, visit_timestamp, page_visited FROM website_traffic;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_type, published_date FROM marketing_content ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category, total_visits FROM brand_performance WHERE total_visits > 1000;
SELECT conversion_id, conversion_value, conversion_date FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_value >= 50.00;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_ip, conversion_event FROM website_traffic WHERE conversion_event = TRUE;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_ip, visit_timestamp FROM website_traffic WHERE conversion_event = true;
SELECT page_visited, visitor_ip FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 1 ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_type, author_name FROM marketing_content WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, total_visits FROM brand_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category, total_visits, conversion_rate FROM brand_performance WHERE total_visits > 1000 AND conversion_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, total_visits ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY visits DESC;
SELECT TOP 3 * FROM brand_marketing_content WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT page_visited, visits FROM website_traffic_data WHERE date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 10000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic_data ORDER BY date DESC, visits ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT page_visited, visits, conversion_rate FROM website_traffic_data WHERE visits > 100 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT id, content_name, publish_date FROM brand_marketing_content WHERE publish_date > '2022-07-01' ORDER BY publish_date ASC
SELECT * FROM conversion_rates WHERE conversion_rate < 0.05 AND source = 'Organic' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE registration_date < '2022-09-15' ORDER BY username ASC
